title: Want to cap frame rates - won't work
body: I have a new laptop with win10, Core i7 and nvidia 960m. I actually like potato settings and want to cap my frame rate. However, when I change it in the client, it does not obey the rate that I am choosing. My laptop can switch from integrated to nvidia, and I already made sure it was opening and using the nvida processor. Any insight?

replies.body:
Which settings are you specifically changing? On top of capping your frames, you may want to enable vertical sync, that way your frames are stable and synced with your display's refresh rate. Below is a screenshot of the configurations I recommend making to get those capped frames.
